title: Playing Bloodmoon and wondering why Oracle is still available

replies.body: I can't believe they didn't add {{champion:141}} to the game also where  {{champion:56}} at he an assassin

Kayn will be in future Blood Moons with Rhaast disabled.
Nocturne I think isn't in the mode because his ult is too powerful. 

Vision restriction is extremely powerful when you need to react fast, so that's why him and Quinn are not in it I believe. And yes Quinn can be played as an assassin, at least once upon a time.
The real question is "Why is Shaco in the mode when there are other fun assassins that aren't cancer to play against that could fill the slot?"
or an even better question is why only some assassins are in the game mode while some people who aren't assassins at all are in it.( {{champion:164}} )
Yea i agree, but at least pantheon makes some form of sense, you can drop his entire kit at once on someone like you're assassinating someone and kill them... but not with camille.
